main.name: Krzysztof Pietruszka
main.description: My career goal is to gain experience which enables me to further my knowledge and frontend skills
main.bio: A self-motivated, creative, and ambitious Front End Developer with 1,5 year of experience in building and maintaining responsive websites in the advertising industry. Proficient in HTML, CSS, jQuery, Javascript and React to build all aspects of the user experience and user interface for client-facing web sites. Passionate about usability and posses great knowledge of Adobe Photoshop.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can find some of my skills

work.title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Bringing mock-ups to life using HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Implementing web design and development principles to build stable software
Collaborating closely with the team to support projects during all phases of delivery
Building websites and apps that are responsive and usable
Monitoring website performance and rectifying front-end-related issues
Communicating technical issues in an understandable manner to the team and clients
Identifying innovative ideas and proof of concepts according to project requirements
Providing guidance and troubleshooting support to clients
Maintaining an organized workflow using a project management tool (like GitHub)
Testing to identify bugs and technical issues before and after deploying
Documenting bug reports, tickets, and any code changes

work.company: Sitel Polska Sp. z o. o.
work.title: Recruitment Specialist
description: Recruiting on a range of projects
Interacting on a daily basis with EMEA marketing hub

work.title: Trainee Web Designer
description: Worked as part of a multi-disciplinary team, carrying out ad-hoc tasks as requested by the Manager. Had a specific brief to ensure the websites build for customers precisely matched their requirements

testimonials.text: I've worked together on some common projects when I was Tech Lead at Cheil. Krzysztof is easy-going person with good way of thinking. Was really great to work with him. He understands web standards well, can adapt his skills to the challenge face to. I recommend him to any companies would have an IT professional in their team.
testimonials.user: Robert Koteles, exTechLead at Cheil, LinkedIn
